attributes.action: honour Janet Wheaton for services to children through her work in education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Janet Wheaton has worked in education (formally as a Nursery Nurse)in Lancashire and Staffordshire and is due to retire later this year.  Janet has left a positive mark on thousands of children, parents, guardians and teaching staff throughout her career and has shown unwavering committment and passion for the role.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
